requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9.0
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9.0
  • Storage: 900 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X compatible
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Inlel i5-4590K or equivalent AMD-Hardware
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 960 or equivalent with 4GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600K or equivalent AMD-Hardware
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 960 or equivalent with 4GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I5 7600 3.5ghz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 / 1660TI
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest 2 w/ PC Connection
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I7 9700k 3.6 ghz+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 / 2060 or better
